name: v1.21
body: * LIB: Log APDU duration and  PHY update in logcat

name: v1.20
body:
* LIB: Log lib version when calling ScardReaderList.create()
* LIB: Remove ScardReaderList.isConnected flag 
* LIB: Call ScardReaderList.onReaderListState() when waking-up with no cards
* LIB: Do not post status callback when creating
* LIB: Do not communicate with the reader and post cb directly if disconnect() is called and the card is already gone
* APP USB: Fix USB not available message
* LIB: Add possibility to use empty callback name

* LIB: send callbacks based on CCID status bit slot changed
* APP: always initialize drawerToggle
* LIB: send onReaderStatus callback instead of error callback if card mute when autoconnect
* LIB: set currentState to idle before posting onReaderStatus callback 
* LIB: improve trace, AOP log all internal calls
* LIB: USB: improve discovering of USB interfaces
* LIB: Refactor errors code and autoconnect
* LIB: Refactoring get info while creating
* LIB: Refactor process function
* LIB: Improve threads and lock management
* LIB: Log currentState getter and setter
* LIB: CMAC invalid disconnect and send error
* LIB: Handle error while connecting, example: empty revision string
* LIB: Send error without disconnecting if user try to send command while device is sleeping
* LIB: Remove ScardReaderList.getPowerInfo() and callback onPowerInfo() (use control)
* LIB: Call onReaderlistError() before onReaderListClosed() when unexpected disconnect
* LIB: Objects readerList passed by onReaderListError() and onReaderListClosed() are now nullable
* LIB: Log lib version when calling ScardReaderList.create()
* LIB: Remove ScardReaderList.isConnected flag
* LIB: Call ScardReaderLis.onReaderListState() when waking-up with no cards
* LIB: Dot not post onReaderStatus() callback when creating

* LIB: send cb and disconnect if auth error
* LIB BLE: set isSleeping var before sending onReaderListState cb
* LIB: remove AOP class in release
* LIB BLE: use subscribe CCID_Status to wake-up
* LIB: set vars before calling callbacks
* LIB BLE: do not try to connect indefinitely id disconnect event

* LIB: refactor onReaderStatus calls
* LIB: store only properties and not the whole object in readerListknown
* LIB BLE: create new state for sleeping
* APP: remember last APDU send
* LIB: do not send multiples CCID commands
* LIB: remove logs in release
* LIB: do not connect to card if cardError or command already pending"
* APP: fix, load default APDU not working
* LIB: use AOP to log library calls
* LIB: Forbid to build a command when the device is sleeping

* LIB BLE: handle ble response before write ack in some cases
* LIB USB: disconnect from anywhere once connected in USB
* LIB USB: handle cards inserted/removed while connecting
* LIB BLE: timeout made static
* APP: re-enable run button if card mute or error
* LIB BLE: change default timeouts to 30s (change timeouts name)
* LIB: refactor callbacks calls if readerList not created, onReaderListError() can give a null readerList 
* LIB: common factory  ScardReaderList.create() between USB and BLE, do not use ScardReaderListBle.create() anymore
* LIB: BLE handle device going to sleep (check scardDevice.isSleeping in onReaderStatus())
* LIB: autoconnect to card in library
* LIB: handle processNextSlotConnection before sending callback

* LIB: connect to cards even is isPowered == true
* APP: Do not try to send if C-APDU box is empty
* LIB: Increment sqn for APDU send while creating ScardReaderList
* APP: Load by default APDU model list from app cache
* LIB BLE: create our own supervision timeout
* LIB BLE: ScardReaderList.setTimeout()

* APP: send log to support email (or at least enable copy)
* LIB: add entryPoint ScardReaderList.clearCache()
* APP BLE: scan permanently on BLE scan fragment
* LIB: ScardReaderList.connected (between onReaderListCreated() and onReaderListClosed())
* APP: disable buttons when a command is already running and depending on card state
* APP: save apdu models (useful when there is no network)
* APP: keep portait screen orientation
* APP BLE: use SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY

* LIB BLE: Counter to retry connecting when disconnect event right after 1st attempt
* LIB BLE: Send error callback when disconnecting if device not present
* LIB BLE: handle events CharWritten and CharChanged not in order
* LIB BLE: refactor auto-connect to card
* LIB BLE: remove timeouts
* LIB BLE: call closed callback when device is sleeping
* LIB USB: force closed callback when device is removed

* LIB BLE: fix oddities in waking-up and sleep state
* LIB: use java mutex wait/notify
* LIB: refactor ActionEvents
* LIB: unlock from library thread + protect reentrance
* LIB USB: remove useless post in main thread from callbacks
* APP USB: fix bug Cannot perform this action after onSaveInstanceState

* LIB: requestConnectionPriority(CONNECTION_PRIORITY_HIGH)
* LIB: disconnect from anywhere in the libraryonce connected in BLE
* LIB: disconnect if device gone
* LIB: use previous SCardreaderList when creating the same device for the 2nd time (improve connection time)
* APP BLE: shutdown BLE device
* LIB: merge pull request: USB support down to Android SDK 14 (4.0)
* LIB: subscribe to CCID_status and RDR_TO_PC notification only
* APP: check that the object received in the callbacks are the ones we are currently working with  (readerList, reader, channel)
* APP BLE: authentication options: select key user or admin
* LIB: handle CCID_Status notif while creating ScardReaderList
* APP: handle onBackPressed when DeviceFragment is resumed

* LIB USB: get slot status for each slot on creating
* LIB: fix unexpected currentState set to Idle 
* LIB: unlocking before posting callback

* LIB: connection to cards already present in slot when creating SCardReaderList
* APP: clear rapduTextBox when returning to deviceFragment for the second time
* LIB: command disconnect → command failed 0b01, fix: get 2 msb (command status) instead of 2 lsb (card status)
* APP: deviceFragment improve onResume() handling (do not reconnect each time)
* LIB: library func getBatteryInfo()
* LIB BLE: connect/reconnect → no BLE frame transmitted if cardPowered and cardPresent
* APP: possibility to use a toast to see how much time takes an APDU list to be executed
* APP: do not run transmit if no card present on slot
* APP + LIB: authentification + encryption
* APP USB: dettached event on DeviceFragment screen -> go back to scan screen
* LIB: use javadoc instead of kolin html
* LIB: refactor readers.disconnect() --> readers.close()
* LIB BLE: connect done in create
